body:
All Versions

  • Added new Release Notes page to track new features and bug fixes
  • Removed specialty mapping tab from settings page unless at least one project has multiple specialty mappings
  • Changed activity stream to just update the time of the activity if performed on the same day with the same parameters
  • Changed label of 'Find a Provider' tile to 'Look up a Provider' and changed the position to be less prominent

Network360 Only

  • Disabled Compare Networks Export button until all quadrants rendered to prevent error

Network360edge Only

  • Removed all tagging functionality
  • Added Counties filter to Assess Markets report
  • Removed volatility and specialty mapping appendix sections from Assess Markets report
